protocol_name: T Cell Activation with anti-CD3 Antibodies Protocol - Mouse
protocol_name_html: T Cell Activation with anti-CD3 Antibodies Protocol - Mouse
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"asm4h","text":"• Sterile PBS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vjn5","text":"• Anti-mouse CD3ε, clone 145-2C11 (LEAF™ format, Cat. No. 100313/100314; Ultra-LEAF™ format, Cat. No. 100339/100340) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhjpj","text":"• Cell culture medium (e.g., RPMI-1640 or IMDM supplemented with 10% FBS and 2mM L-glutamine) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3uia","text":"• Sterile, single-cell suspension (e.g., splenocytes, lymph node cells), isolated T cells or T cell subsets ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddhmd","text":"• 96-well flat-bottom tissue culture plates with lids (e.g., Costar® Cat. No. 3596)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"2so35","text":"Prepare a 5\u00b5g\/ml solution of anti-CD3\u03b5 (clone 145-2C11) in sterile PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"43C66431F0DB414C9013982EDA084BA1","id":664627,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75m5e","text":"Dispense 50\u00b5l of the antibody solution to each microwell of the 96-well assay plate. For the unstimulated control wells, add 50\u00b5l of sterile PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"avu90","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"BF9DD4215BE146ADB3A617B3E2227890","id":664628,"previous_id":664627,"previous_guid":"43C66431F0DB414C9013982EDA084BA1","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rla3","text":"Seal plate. Incubate at 37\u00b0C for 2 hours or 4\u00b0C overnight. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":58,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"edooo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"089BCD50B84611E899883FC166E534AC","duration":7200,"label":"","step_guid":"90A56E1BCB0E4F0BABE33DE2D94B1EEB"}}],"guid":"90A56E1BCB0E4F0BABE33DE2D94B1EEB","id":664629,"previous_id":664628,"previous_guid":"BF9DD4215BE146ADB3A617B3E2227890","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2e95i","text":"Wash plate microwells 3 times with sterile PBS. Discard liquid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"6A9E99B8AACA4018A3EBAA50EF1B15CA","id":664631,"previous_id":664630,"previous_guid":"230BA5D39C7946AA8BD13B3C3D152CA7","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5bjup","text":"Prepare single cell suspension of cells of interest.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"BF38EFC4A4F44B02AFC0C2B24CD9C18A","id":664632,"previous_id":664636,"previous_guid":"6A9E99B8AACA4018A3EBAA50EF1B15CA","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"enktm","text":"Resuspend cells in supplemented cell culture medium to 1-2 x 106\/ml.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":63,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"A995953D737441DA83FA7560B19662E8","id":664633,"previous_id":664632,"previous_guid":"BF38EFC4A4F44B02AFC0C2B24CD9C18A","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9dfc5","text":"Aliquot 200\u00b5l cell suspension into plate microwells. Cover with lid. Incubate at 37\u00b0C in 5% CO2and 100% humidity for 3 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":94,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"503D998BC4124B9091A7EF5FF03D0BCD","id":664634,"previous_id":664633,"previous_guid":"A995953D737441DA83FA7560B19662E8","section":null}
